section.name: Overview
section.p: The project goal is to develop a graphical user interface for programming a CPLD (Complex Programable Logics Device). The software is written in C++ and based on QT. It will be available for Linux and Windows.

The development team is 7 persons, all students of the University of Stuttgart, Germany. The project is part of our studies in Software Engineering. The output of the project is going to be used in conjunction with a hardware system called Offener Antrieb also developed at the University.

section.name: Ueberblick
section.p: Entwicklung einer Programmierumgebung fuer einen CPLD-basierten Offenen Antrieb
